name: Tagify -  Best Hashtags for Instagram
description: Are you looking for the best hashtags to tag your photos or videos? For more likes and followers? The hashtags generator is the easiest way to find the right hashtags. It generates 30 random hashtags matching to your search term.  The best way to reach a diversified number of people on Instagram is to use a good mix of Instagram hashtags. Especially if you are a business using Instagram as your marketing platform.  Features of Tagify app are: + You can search easily to find the most relevant hashtags of the moment related to your posts + This app will help you to increase likes of your photos, posts and their rating. Just copy and paste necessary hashtags. + This app has all popular hashtags, implemented convenient search.  + You able to add your own tags, mix them with existing and save them in a separate card for reuse.  + In other words, you can find best and top tags for likes for Instagram to increase your followers. + Also it has hotkeys for opening most popular social networks, such as Instagram, Facebook, Vkontakte, Twitter, Pinterest, Google Plus. + This app provides predefined hashtags/tags for different categories. Such as: * Popular hashtags * Nature hashtags * Weather / Seasons hashtags * Animal hashtags * Social hashtags * People hashtags * Holiday hashtags * Celebration hashtags * Family hashtags * Art hashtags * Photography hashtags * Urban Tags * Food / Drink hashtags * Fashion hashtags * Celebrities hashtags * Entertainment hashtags * Electronics hashtags * Summer hashtags * Industry hashtags * Niche hashtags * Location hashtags * Event hashtags * Follow / Shoutout / Like / Comment hashtags * Travel / Sports / Active hashtags * Other  [User Guide] -->> Simply choose a hashtag name, tap Copy button or tap Copy with Facebook, Instagram, Twitter button(means copy and open that app) then open Instagram, Facebook or Twitter and paste on your pictures and posts!  This app is not affiliated with Instagram.  Tagify is a free app. Setup and enjoy!.
